channel.title: Out of the Box on Out of the box
channel.description: Recent content in Out of the Box on Out of the box

item.title: Out of the Box
item.description: I’m based in Zurich and I work remotely; the easiest way to get in touch is sending me an email: naus3a@gmail.com

item.title: Out of the Box
item.description: Out of the Box is a boutique software house. It is led by Enrico Viola, which is me. I am a creative technologist. Which means I can code, design and figure out the best way to make any tech tell its story.

item.title: Out of the Box
item.description: Most of my recent projects involve some form of NDA preventing me from showing them here, but you can still have a look at some of my past work here: http://naus3a.ml

item.title: Out of the Box
item.description: I’m an emerging tech specialist, who spent the last 15 years designing and developing award winning interactive installations, live shows, academic and industrial prototypes. My areas of expertise include graphic computing, computer vision, robotics, XR.
